Has_CollaborativeForecasting.label: Is Collaborative Forecasting enabled?
Has_CollaborativeForecasting.description: Both Collaborative Forecasting and Forecast Hierarchy have to be set up.

Has_CollaborativeForecastingQuota.label: Is Collaborative Forecasting Quata enabled?
Has_CollaborativeForecastingQuota.description: Is Collaborative Forecast Quota set up?

Opportunity_Amount.label: What field contains the total amount of the opportunity?
Opportunity_Amount.description: Choose the field you use to track the total amount of the opportunity.

Has_RoleHierarchy.label: Is the Customer Using Role Hierarchy?

Has_OpportunitySplits.label: Is Opportunity Splits set up?
Has_OpportunitySplits.description: We pull in all Opportunity Split types.

Has_Minimum_Data_For_EDStory.label: Is there enough data in customer org to run the Likelihood_To_Win ED Story?
Has_Minimum_Data_For_EDStory.description: Check Opportunity Data for at least 400 opps, 25 won and 25 lost

Has_Products.label: Is the customer using Opportunity Products?

Has_Activities.label: Are Events and Tasks set up?

EAC_Dataset.label: Does the EAC Activities dataset exist?

Fiscal_Month.label: What month starts your fiscal period?
Fiscal_Month.description: Select the start date of your fiscal period. If it is different than January, you also need to update the Quotas dataset JSON file.

First_Day_Of_Week.description: Internal mapping for first day of week

FY_Month_Offset_Map.description: Internal mapping between fiscal year start months and offset, not to be displayed in UI.
